participant_1.name: Lily
participant_1.personality: Creative and nurturing, enjoys engaging in activities that inspire and bring joy to others.
participant_1.background: I love my green tea set. I like to watch The Repair Shop when I need some inspiration for my own car repairs. I have a 3 year old. I have a lizard named Nagini. My favorite band is The Avett Brothers.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Thoughtful and imaginative, values storytelling and enjoys exploring new ideas through literature.
participant_2.background: I love the smell of beans, but my stomach doesn't. I love to read books because it transports me to another world and I can forget about my troubles. I was single for a long time before I met my current boyfriend. My brother thinks he is a viking. I'm an only child.

content.text: What's up?
Not much, just hanging out. How are you?
I'm good, just got done watching The Repair Shop. Have you ever seen it?
No, I haven't. What's it about?
It's a show where people bring in old items and have them repaired by a team of experts. It's really interesting and inspiring.
That sounds really cool! I'll have to check it out.
You should! It's on Netflix.
Okay, thanks for the recommendation!
No problem! So, what do you like to do for fun?
I love to read. It's a great way to escape from the real world and explore new worlds.
I love reading too! What are some of your favorite books?
I love the Harry Potter series, the Hunger Games series, and the Percy Jackson series.
Those are all great series! I love them too.
Yeah, they're so good! What's your favorite band?
My favorite band is The Avett Brothers. I love their music.
I've never heard of them. What kind of music do they play?
They're a folk band. Their music is really beautiful and catchy.
Okay, I'll have to check them out.
You should! I think you'll like them.
Okay, I will. Thanks for the recommendation!
No problem! So, what else do you like to do for fun?
I also like to go to the movies, go hiking, and spend time with my family.
Those all sound like great activities! I love going to the movies too.
Yeah, it's a great way to relax and have some fun.
So, what are you doing this weekend?
I'm not sure yet. What are you doing?
I'm not sure either. Maybe we could hang out?
That would be fun! What do you want to do?
We could go to the movies, go hiking, or just hang out at my place.
Okay, let's go to the movies. There's a new movie I've been wanting to see.
Okay, sounds good! I'll pick you up at 7pm.
Okay, see you then!
